channel.title: How to edit drops in a 718/728
channel.description: I am working on a 718/728 server for a few weeks,and updated/fixed alot,the only thing i have to do till i finished it,is changing the drops of the npc's. But i have no idea how to do that on a 718, It has a file called dropeditor in the source,but I dont know how to use it,i also dont know if it works. If someone could help me,i would be very thankfull :) The source is Zenith.

okey thanks,could u post it on here? cuz im rarely on skype
